Articles.Content:
Hello everyone, I am proud to present my first project. Behold the SKYSPLITTER.

Its a little sensitive to hard steering for the first 2 stages, but after that its smooth sailing all the way to the Mun. Believe me, I have already made two successful round trips with it. Also its completely stock. This is my first successful stock Mun rocket. ENJOY! 8)
Im going to be creating more rockets with novapunch and other mods. Theres more to come so have fun. 8)
Hehehe...Good work! Big enough ship you got there... ???

The reason for its gigantic size is the 2 stage lander with 4 detachable fuel tanks. I wanted it to be sort of like the apollo lander. You know, be able to leave some proof of your achievment on the Mun.
